promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare bear dark-type pokemon wearing a ancient mask. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Maskursa, a a chibi young rare bear dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Horn. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "dark" or "Maskursa". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, bear-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: A nocturnal teddy-like creature, Maskursa navigates caved realms with ease, utilizing the gloom-tipped horn on its forehead.
